price: Mereka menjadikan sumpah-sumpah mereka sebagai perisai, lalu mereka menghalang-halangi (manusia) dari jalan Allah; maka bagi mereka azab yang menghinakan.
arabic: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَهُمۡ جُنَّةٗ فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ittakhadhū aymānahum junnatan faṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi falahum ʿadhābun muhīnun
